mapper.select: select a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time from article_classify ac1 join (article_classify ac2, article a) on ac1.classify_id = ac2.classify_id and ac2.article_id = a.id where ac1.article_id != ac2.article_id and ac1.article_id = #{id} order by a.creation_time desc

select count(atg1.tag_id) tagCount, a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time from article_tag atg1 join (article_tag atg2 , article a ) on atg1.tag_id = atg2.tag_id and atg2.article_id = a.id where atg1.article_id != atg2.article_id and atg1.article_id = #{id} group by atg1.article_id, atg2.article_id order by tagCount desc

select a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time, a.if_private, u.nickname, u.username, cy.id as classify_id, cy.name as classify_name, cy.annotation as classify_annotation, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name, t.annotation as tag_annotation, count(ac.id) as comment_count from user_article ua left join( `user` u , article a , article_classify acy , classify cy , article_tag atg , tag t ) on ua.user_id = u.id and ua.article_id = a.id and acy.article_id = a.id and cy.id = acy.classify_id and atg.article_id = a.id and t.id = atg.tag_id left join article_comment ac on ac.article_id = a.id where a.if_private = 0 group by a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time, a.if_private, u.nickname, u.username, cy.id, cy.name, cy.annotation, t.id, t.name, t.annotation

select a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time, a.if_private, u.nickname, u.username, cy.id as classify_id, cy.name as classify_name, cy.annotation as classify_annotation, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name, t.annotation as tag_annotation, count(ac.id) as comment_count from user_article ua left join( `user` u , article a , article_classify acy , classify cy , article_tag atg , tag t ) on ua.user_id = u.id and ua.article_id = a.id and acy.article_id = a.id and cy.id = acy.classify_id and atg.article_id = a.id and t.id = atg.tag_id left join article_comment ac on ac.article_id = a.id where u.username = #{username} group by a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time, a.if_private, u.nickname, u.username, cy.id, cy.name, cy.annotation, t.id, t.name, t.annotation

select a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time, a.if_private, u.nickname, u.username, cy.id as classify_id, cy.name as classify_name, cy.annotation as classify_annotation, t.id as tag_id, t.name as tag_name, t.annotation as tag_annotation, count(ac.id) as comment_count from user_article ua left join( `user` u , article a , article_classify acy , classify cy , article_tag atg , tag t ) on ua.user_id = u.id and ua.article_id = a.id and acy.article_id = a.id and cy.id = acy.classify_id and atg.article_id = a.id and t.id = atg.tag_id left join article_comment ac on ac.article_id = a.id where a.id = #{articleID} group by a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.creation_time, a.modify_time, a.if_private, u.nickname, u.username, cy.id, cy.name, cy.annotation, t.id, t.name, t.annotation

select year(a.creation_time) as year, month(a.creation_time) as month, date_format(a.creation_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.if_private, a.creation_time, a.modify_time from article a join user_article ua on a.id = ua.article_id where ua.user_id = #{userID} order by a.creation_time

select year(a.creation_time) as year, month(a.creation_time) as month, date_format(a.creation_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, a.id, a.icon, a.title, a.synopsis, a.views, a.like_count, a.if_private, a.creation_time, a.modify_time from article a where a.if_private = 0 order by a.creation_time
